hint: A round fruit with red or green skin and a sweet or sour taste.
A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.
A place where students go to learn.
A large mammal with a trunk and tusks, native to Africa and Asia.
An area of land where plants, flowers, and sometimes vegetables are grown.
A device used for processing data and performing tasks.
A sandy or pebbly area of land beside the sea or a lake.
The art of producing sounds with voice or instruments.
Footwear worn to protect and comfort the feet.
A type of pie traditionally made with tomatoes and cheese.
A large natural elevation of the Earth's surface rising abruptly from the surrounding level; a large steep hill.
A vehicle with two wheels that is propelled by pedals and steered by handlebars.
A vast expanse of saltwater that covers most of the Earth's surface.
A celestial body moving in an elliptical orbit around a star.
